value.string:
"""
 The release signature is a kind of declarative
 specification of an upgrader.
 """
 
 # Alarm dict is used to enable/disable upgrade alarms.
 # ie.: If you don't want upgrade products in some environments
 # you can just define 'product_upgrader' : False.
 
 ALARM_DICT = {
 "system_upgrader" : True,
 "product_upgrader" : True,
 "bt5_upgrader" : True,
 "finalize_upgrader" : True
 }
 
 # The destination release provided by this upgrader
 DESTINATION_RELEASE = '5.4.6'
 
 ZOPE_VERSION = "2.8.11"
 
 PYTHON_VERSION = "2.4.6"
 
 # The list of URLs to get bt5 from
 # NOTE: we expect the system buildout to be able
 # to get everything we need from SVN and copy it
 # to /srv/share/RELEASE/bt5/
 # Some people may prefer to download stuff from the web
 # but this is not the way we are going since we recommend
 # the use of a standard buildout to create the filesystem
 # hierarchy
 # XXX-Luke: See bug #1503 - this variable is very hard to be used in Upgrader
 # tests.
 BT5_URL_BASE_LIST = ( 'file:///srv/share/bt5/%s' % DESTINATION_RELEASE ,
 'http://www.erp5.org/dists/release/%s/bt5/' % DESTINATION_RELEASE,
 # XXX Use snapshot folder to test upgrade to HEAD
 'http://www.erp5.org/dists/snapshot/bt5/',
 'file:///srv/share/bt5/upgrade',
 # INSTANCE_HOME_REPOSITORY represents $INSTANCE_HOME/bt5 
 # It is not possible get the instance home into ZODB easily,
 # so the detection script find the appropriate repository 
 # for the Business Templates.
 'INSTANCE_HOME_REPOSITORY' ,
 )
 
 if getattr(context, "ERP5Site_getBT5UrlBaseList", None) is not None:
 # XXX This script should be present when it is required custom places for
 # run upgrade (ie.: unit tests)
 BT5_URL_BASE_LIST = context.ERP5Site_getBT5UrlBaseList()
 
 
 # A list of bt5 which the upgrader can upgrade
 # ie. a bt5 not in this list will not be upgraded
 # by having an explicit list we can handle dedicate
 # and we can allow people to create some developer mode
 # stuff which they can control
 UPGRADABLE_BT5_ID_LIST = (
 "erp5_l10n_fr",
 "erp5_l10n_ja",
 "erp5_l10n_ko",
 "erp5_l10n_pl_PL",
 "erp5_l10n_pt-BR",
 "erp5_accounting_l10n_ifrs",
 "erp5_accounting_l10n_fr", 
 "erp5_accounting_l10n_sn",
 # Update some bt5 not from default
 # But it can be present
 "erp5_mobile",
 "erp5_ui_test_core",
 "erp5_ui_test",
 )
 
 # A list bt5 which are required for the upgrade
 # ie. the upgrader will install them even
 # if they are not already installed
 REQUIRED_BT5_ID_LIST = ("erp5_core",
 "erp5_mysql_innodb_catalog",
 "erp5_xhtml_style",
 "erp5_knowledge_pad",
 "erp5_base",
 "erp5_wizard",
 "erp5_odt_style",
 "erp5_ods_style",
 "erp5_ingestion_mysql_innodb_catalog",
 "erp5_ingestion",
 "erp5_crm",
 "erp5_web",
 "erp5_dms",
 "erp5_pdm",
 "erp5_trade",
 "erp5_accounting",
 "erp5_invoicing",
 "erp5_simplified_invoicing",
 "tiolive_base",
 "erp5_tax_resource",
 "erp5_discount_resource",
 "erp5_legacy_tax_system",
 "erp5_ooo_import",
 "express_customisation",
 )
 
 # A list bt5 which are required to upgrade catalog.
 # After the bt5 be updated, update catalog will be trigger.
 UPDATE_CATALOG_BT5_ID_LIST = ()
 
 
 # Call some scripts inside same transaction before or after BT update
 BEFORE_TRIGGERED_BT5_SCRIPT_ID_DICT = {}
 AFTER_TRIGGERED_BT5_SCRIPT_ID_DICT = {'erp5_mysql_innodb_catalog': ('ERP5Site_updateSitePropertyForTestOnly',)}
 
 # A list bt5 which require reinstallation
 # ie. the upgrader will call reinstall
 # on each of them and revert all local changes.
 REINSTALABLE_BT5_ID_LIST = ('erp5_odt_style',
 )
 
 # A snapshot of workflow chains which are known to be valid
 # this snapshot will be generated automatically from release
 # document in the future.
 #
 # chains are exhaustive: they may contain more workflows that
 # installed workflows in a system (which is not perfect for
 # example in the case of -chains in bt5)
 
 # XXX It is only for test proprose now.
 WORKFLOW_CHAIN_DICT = {'chain_Account': 'edit_workflow, account_workflow',
 'chain_Accounting Period': 'edit_workflow, accounting_period_workflow',
 'chain_Accounting Transaction': 'accounting_workflow, edit_workflow',
 'chain_Accounting Transaction Line': 'delivery_movement_causality_interaction_workflow, delivery_movement_simulation_interaction_workflow, edit_workflow',
 'chain_Acknowledgement': 'acknowledgement_workflow',
 'chain_Action Information': 'base_type_interaction_workflow',
 'chain_Address': 'edit_workflow',
 'chain_Agent': 'edit_workflow',
 'chain_Assignment': 'edit_workflow, assignment_workflow',
 'chain_Balance Transaction': 'edit_workflow, accounting_workflow',
 'chain_Bank Account': 'validation_workflow, edit_workflow',
 'chain_Base Category': 'category_publication_workflow, edit_workflow',
 'chain_Base Type': 'base_type_interaction_workflow',
 'chain_Business Path': 'edit_workflow',
 'chain_Business Process': 'edit_workflow, validation_workflow',
 'chain_Business State': 'edit_workflow',
 'chain_Business Template': 'business_template_building_workflow, business_template_installation_workflow',
 'chain_Campaign': 'edit_workflow, pricing_interaction_workflow, ticket_workflow, ticket_interaction_workflow',
 'chain_Career': 'career_workflow',
 'chain_Cash Register': 'validation_workflow, edit_workflow',
 'chain_Category': 'category_publication_workflow, edit_workflow',
 'chain_Category Divergence Tester': 'edit_workflow',
 'chain_Chat Address': 'edit_workflow',
 'chain_Component': 'validation_workflow, edit_workflow',
 'chain_Container': 'edit_workflow, pricing_interaction_workflow',
 'chain_Container Cell': 'container_interaction_workflow, pricing_interaction_workflow, edit_workflow',
 'chain_Container Line': 'edit_workflow, trade_matrix_workflow, container_interaction_workflow, pricing_interaction_workflow',
 'chain_Credit Card': 'edit_workflow, validation_workflow',
 'chain_Currency': 'validation_workflow, edit_workflow',
 'chain_Currency Exchange Line': 'validation_workflow, currency_exchange_line_interaction_workflow, edit_workflow',
 'chain_Delivery Cell': 'delivery_movement_simulation_interaction_workflow, delivery_movement_causality_interaction_workflow',
 'chain_Delivery Rule': 'rule_validation_workflow, edit_workflow',
 'chain_Discount': 'edit_workflow, validation_workflow',
 'chain_Distributed Ram Cache': 'distributed_ram_cache_interaction_workflow',
 'chain_Document': 'edit_workflow',
 'chain_Document Ingestion Message': 'document_ingestion_interaction_workflow, document_ingestion_workflow, edit_workflow',
 'chain_Drawing': 'edit_workflow, local_permission_interaction_workflow, processing_status_workflow, document_interaction_workflow, document_publication_workflow',
 'chain_Email': 'edit_workflow',
 'chain_Fax': 'edit_workflow',
 'chain_Fax Message': 'edit_workflow, event_interaction_workflow, event_workflow, pricing_interaction_workflow',
 'chain_File': 'edit_workflow, local_permission_interaction_workflow, processing_status_workflow, document_publication_workflow, document_interaction_workflow',
 'chain_Gadget': 'edit_workflow, knowledge_pad_validation_workflow',
 'chain_Image': 'edit_workflow, local_permission_interaction_workflow, processing_status_workflow, document_publication_workflow, document_interaction_workflow',
 'chain_Internal Packing List': 'packing_list_workflow, edit_workflow, delivery_causality_workflow, delivery_causality_interaction_workflow, delivery_simulation_interaction_workflow',
 'chain_Internal Packing List Cell': 'delivery_movement_simulation_interaction_workflow, pricing_interaction_workflow, delivery_movement_causality_interaction_workflow',
 'chain_Internal Packing List Line': 'delivery_movement_causality_interaction_workflow, edit_workflow, trade_matrix_workflow, pricing_interaction_workflow, delivery_movement_simulation_interaction_workflow, movement_base_contribution_interaction_workflow',
 'chain_Internal Supply': 'edit_workflow, validation_workflow',
 'chain_Internal Supply Line': 'edit_workflow, supply_line_interaction_workflow',
 'chain_Inventory': 'inventory_workflow, edit_workflow',
 'chain_Inventory Cell': 'pricing_interaction_workflow',
 'chain_Inventory Line': 'trade_matrix_workflow, pricing_interaction_workflow, edit_workflow',
 'chain_Invoice Cell': 'pricing_interaction_workflow, delivery_movement_causality_interaction_workflow, delivery_movement_simulation_interaction_workflow, tax_interaction_workflow, edit_workflow',
 'chain_Invoice Line': 'delivery_movement_simulation_interaction_workflow, pricing_interaction_workflow, tax_interaction_workflow, trade_matrix_workflow, delivery_movement_causality_interaction_workflow, edit_workflow, movement_base_contribution_interaction_workflow',
 'chain_Invoice Rule': 'edit_workflow, rule_validation_workflow',
 'chain_Invoice Transaction Rule': 'edit_workflow, rule_interaction_workflow, rule_validation_workflow',
 'chain_Invoicing Rule': 'edit_workflow, rule_validation_workflow',
 'chain_Knowledge Box': 'edit_workflow, knowledge_pad_validation_workflow',
 'chain_Knowledge Pad': 'edit_workflow, knowledge_pad_validation_workflow',
 'chain_Letter': 'event_interaction_workflow, edit_workflow, pricing_interaction_workflow, event_workflow',
 'chain_Link': 'edit_workflow',
 'chain_Mail Message': 'edit_workflow, pricing_interaction_workflow, event_workflow, event_interaction_workflow',
 'chain_Mapped Value': 'edit_workflow',
 'chain_Measure': 'edit_workflow, measure_interaction_workflow',
 'chain_Meeting': 'pricing_interaction_workflow, edit_workflow, ticket_workflow, ticket_interaction_workflow',
 'chain_Memcached Plugin': 'memcached_plugin_interaction_workflow',
 'chain_Note': 'event_workflow, edit_workflow, pricing_interaction_workflow, event_interaction_workflow',
 'chain_Notification Message': 'edit_workflow, notification_message_workflow',
 'chain_Order Rule': 'edit_workflow, rule_validation_workflow',
 'chain_Organisation': 'edit_workflow, validation_workflow',
 'chain_PDF': 'edit_workflow, local_permission_interaction_workflow, processing_status_workflow, document_interaction_workflow, document_publication_workflow',
 'chain_Payment Condition': 'edit_workflow',
 'chain_Payment Rule': 'edit_workflow, rule_validation_workflow',
 'chain_Payment Transaction': 'edit_workflow, accounting_workflow',
 'chain_Person': 'validation_workflow, edit_workflow, user_account_workflow, local_permission_interaction_workflow, person_interaction_workflow, express_person_interaction_workflow',
 
 'chain_Phone Call': 'event_interaction_workflow, event_workflow, pricing_interaction_workflow, edit_workflow',
 'chain_Predicate': 'rule_interaction_workflow',
 'chain_Preference': 'preference_workflow',
 'chain_Presentation': 'edit_workflow, document_publication_workflow, local_permission_interaction_workflow, processing_status_workflow, document_interaction_workflow',
 'chain_Product': 'validation_workflow, edit_workflow',
 'chain_Property Divergence Tester': 'edit_workflow',
 'chain_Purchase Invoice Transaction': 'delivery_simulation_interaction_workflow, delivery_causality_interaction_workflow, edit_workflow, accounting_workflow, delivery_tax_interaction_workflow, delivery_causality_workflow',
 'chain_Purchase Invoice Transaction Line': 'edit_workflow, delivery_movement_causality_interaction_workflow, delivery_movement_simulation_interaction_workflow',
 'chain_Purchase Order': 'edit_workflow, order_workflow, order_simulation_interaction_workflow, delivery_tax_interaction_workflow',
 'chain_Purchase Order Cell': 'edit_workflow, pricing_interaction_workflow, tax_interaction_workflow, order_movement_simulation_interaction_workflow',
 'chain_Purchase Order Line': 'order_movement_simulation_interaction_workflow, edit_workflow, trade_matrix_workflow, pricing_interaction_workflow, tax_interaction_workflow, movement_base_contribution_interaction_workflow',
 'chain_Purchase Packing List': 'edit_workflow, delivery_simulation_interaction_workflow, packing_list_workflow, delivery_causality_interaction_workflow, delivery_causality_workflow',
 'chain_Purchase Packing List Cell': 'pricing_interaction_workflow, delivery_movement_causality_interaction_workflow, delivery_movement_simulation_interaction_workflow',
 'chain_Purchase Packing List Line': 'edit_workflow, pricing_interaction_workflow, delivery_movement_causality_interaction_workflow, trade_matrix_workflow, delivery_movement_simulation_interaction_workflow, movement_base_contribution_interaction_workflow',
 'chain_Purchase Supply': 'edit_workflow, validation_workflow',
 'chain_Purchase Supply Line': 'edit_workflow, supply_line_interaction_workflow',
 'chain_Purchase Trade Condition': 'edit_workflow, validation_workflow',
 'chain_Quantity Divergence Tester': 'edit_workflow',
 'chain_Query': 'edit_workflow, query_workflow',
 'chain_RSS Feed': 'document_publication_workflow, edit_workflow, local_permission_interaction_workflow',
 'chain_Returned Sale Packing List': 'delivery_causality_workflow, edit_workflow, packing_list_workflow, delivery_causality_workflow',
 'chain_Returned Sale Packing List Cell': 'pricing_interaction_workflow',
 'chain_Returned Sale Packing List Line': 'pricing_interaction_workflow, trade_matrix_workflow',
 'chain_Role Definition': 'local_permission_interaction_workflow, edit_workflow',
 'chain_Rounding Model': 'validation_workflow',
 'chain_Sale Invoice Transaction': 'delivery_simulation_interaction_workflow, delivery_causality_interaction_workflow, edit_workflow, accounting_workflow, delivery_tax_interaction_workflow, delivery_causality_workflow',
 'chain_Sale Invoice Transaction Line': 'edit_workflow, delivery_movement_causality_interaction_workflow, delivery_movement_simulation_interaction_workflow',
 'chain_Sale Opportunity': 'pricing_interaction_workflow, ticket_interaction_workflow, sale_opportunity_workflow, edit_workflow',
 'chain_Sale Order': 'edit_workflow, order_workflow, order_simulation_interaction_workflow, delivery_tax_interaction_workflow',
 'chain_Sale Order Cell': 'edit_workflow, pricing_interaction_workflow, tax_interaction_workflow, order_movement_simulation_interaction_workflow',
 'chain_Sale Order Line': 'order_movement_simulation_interaction_workflow, edit_workflow, trade_matrix_workflow, pricing_interaction_workflow, tax_interaction_workflow, movement_base_contribution_interaction_workflow',
 'chain_Sale Packing List': 'edit_workflow, packing_list_workflow, delivery_causality_interaction_workflow, delivery_simulation_interaction_workflow, delivery_causality_workflow, packing_list_container_workflow',
 'chain_Sale Packing List Cell': 'pricing_interaction_workflow, delivery_movement_simulation_interaction_workflow, container_interaction_workflow, delivery_movement_causality_interaction_workflow',
 'chain_Sale Packing List Line': 'edit_workflow, pricing_interaction_workflow, container_interaction_workflow, trade_matrix_workflow, delivery_movement_causality_interaction_workflow, delivery_movement_simulation_interaction_workflow, movement_base_contribution_interaction_workflow',
 'chain_Sale Supply': 'edit_workflow, validation_workflow',
 'chain_Sale Supply Line': 'edit_workflow, supply_line_interaction_workflow',
 'chain_Sale Trade Condition': 'edit_workflow, validation_workflow',
 'chain_Service': 'validation_workflow, edit_workflow',
 'chain_Simulation Movement': 'simulation_movement_causality_interaction_workflow',
 'chain_Site Message': 'edit_workflow, event_interaction_workflow, event_workflow',

 'chain_Support Request': 'edit_workflow, pricing_interaction_workflow, ticket_interaction_workflow, ticket_workflow',
 'chain_System Preference': 'preference_workflow',
 'chain_Tax': 'edit_workflow, validation_workflow',
 'chain_Tax Rule': 'edit_workflow, rule_validation_workflow',
 'chain_Telephone': 'edit_workflow',
 'chain_Text': 'edit_workflow, processing_status_workflow, local_permission_interaction_workflow, document_publication_workflow, document_interaction_workflow',
 'chain_Trade Model Line': 'edit_workflow, trade_model_line_interaction_workflow',
 'chain_Trade Model Rule': 'edit_workflow, rule_validation_workflow',
 'chain_Transformation': 'edit_workflow, validation_workflow',
 'chain_Transformation Operation': 'edit_workflow',
 'chain_Transformation Optional Resource': 'edit_workflow',
 'chain_Transformation Transformed Resource': 'edit_workflow',
 'chain_URL Crawler': 'edit_workflow, document_publication_workflow, local_permission_interaction_workflow',
 'chain_Visit': 'event_interaction_workflow, pricing_interaction_workflow, event_workflow, edit_workflow',
 'chain_Web Message': 'pricing_interaction_workflow, event_interaction_workflow, event_workflow, edit_workflow',
 'chain_Web Page': 'local_permission_interaction_workflow, edit_workflow, document_publication_workflow, document_interaction_workflow',
 'chain_Web Section': 'category_publication_workflow, local_permission_interaction_workflow, edit_workflow',
 'chain_Web Site': 'local_permission_interaction_workflow, edit_workflow, category_publication_workflow'}
 
 # Portal Type definition based on portal_types_roles_express.sxc
 # Once this document changes this script should be immediately 
 # updated to include or fix any security change.
 
 # Portal Types to be updated using updateMappingDefinition.
 UPDATE_ROLE_PORTAL_TYPE_LIST = [ 'Person Module',
 'Organisation Module',
 'Currency Module',
 'Query Module',
 'Event Module',
 'Sale Opportunity Module',
 'Support Request Module',
 'Meeting Module',
 'Campaign Module',
 'Accounting Transaction Module',
 'Account Module',
 'Sale Trade Condition Module',
 'Purchase Trade Condition Module',
 'Sale Order Module',
 'Purchase Order Module',
 'Sale Packing List Module',
 'Purchase Packing List Module',
 'Inventory Module',
 'Document Module',
 'Image Module',
 'Document Ingestion Module',
 'Web Page Module',
 'Component Module',
 'Product Module',
 'Service Module',
 'Tax Module',
 'Contribution Tool',
 'Gadget Tool',
 'Knowledge Pad Module',
 'Person',
 'Organisation',
 'Currency',
 'Query',
 'Assignment',
 'Fax Message',
 'Web Message',
 'Letter',
 'Mail Message',
 'Note',
 'Visit',

 'Sale Opportunity',
 'Support Request',
 'Meeting',
 'Campaign',
 'Account',

 'Balance Transaction',
 'Sale Invoice Transaction',
 'Purchase Invoice Transaction',
 'Accounting Transaction',
 'Payment Transaction',
 'Bank Account',
 'Cash Register',
 'Credit Card',
 'Drawing',
 'PDF',
 'Presentation',
 'Spreadsheet',
 'Text',
 'Web Page',
 'Wizard Tool',
 'Component',
 'Product',
 'Service',
 'Transformation',
 'Transformation Operation',
 'Transformation Optional Resource',
 'Transformation Transformed Resource',
 'Tax',
 'Inventory',
 'Purchase Order',
 'Purchase Packing List',
 'Purchase Trade Condition',
 'Sale Order',
 'Sale Packing List',
 'Sale Trade Condition',
 'Gadget',
 'Knowledge Pad',
 'Knowledge Box', 
 'Currency Exchange Line'
 ]
 
 # A property sheet expected to found into a Portal Type List.
 # Example: ('TradeOrder', ["Sale Packing List", "Purchase Packing List"]),
 PORTAL_TYPE_PROPERTY_SHEET_LIST = []
 
 # items to keep even if marked by BT5 to 'Remove'
 KEEP_ORIGINAL_DICT = {
 'erp5_core':('portal_preferences/default_site_preference',
 'portal_categories/function',
 ),
 
 'erp5_dms':('portal_workflow/processing_status_workflow',
 'portal_categories/contributor',
 'portal_skins/erp5_dms/Image_view/image_view'
 ),
 
 'erp5_base':('portal_categories/specialise',
 ),
 
 'erp5_trade':('portal_workflow/delivery_tax_interaction_workflow',
 'portal_workflow/tax_interaction_workflow',
 'tax_module',
 'discount_module',
 'portal_types/Discount',
 'portal_types/Discount Line',
 'portal_types/Discount Model Line',
 'portal_types/Discount Module',
 'portal_types/Tax',
 'portal_types/Tax Line',
 'portal_types/Tax Model Line',
 'portal_types/Tax Module',),
 
 'erp5_invoicing':('portal_workflow/delivery_movement_account_interaction_workflow',
 ),
 
 'erp5_wizard':('portal_preferences/erp5_express_default_customer_preference',
 ),
 
 }
 
 # Items which need validation at upgrade time
 VALIDATION_DICT = {
 'erp5_base':(('portal_categories/group', 'draft', 'embed'),
 ('portal_categories/site', 'draft', 'embed'),
 ),
 
 'erp5_knowledge_pad': (# Make gadgets visible
 ('portal_gadgets/clock', 'invisible', 'visible'),
 ('portal_gadgets/erp5_advertisement', 'invisible', 'visible'),
 ('portal_gadgets/erp5_documentation', 'invisible', 'visible'),
 ('portal_gadgets/erp5_persons', 'invisible', 'visible'),
 ('portal_gadgets/erp5_rss', 'invisible', 'visible'),
 ('portal_gadgets/erp5_worklists', 'invisible', 'visible'),
 ('portal_gadgets/google_calendar', 'invisible', 'visible'),
 ('portal_gadgets/google_maps', 'invisible', 'visible'),
 ('portal_gadgets/google_search', 'invisible', 'visible'),
 # Make gadgets published
 ('portal_gadgets/clock', 'visible', 'public'),
 ('portal_gadgets/erp5_advertisement', 'visible', 'public'),
 ('portal_gadgets/erp5_documentation', 'visible', 'public'),
 ('portal_gadgets/erp5_persons', 'visible', 'public'),
 ('portal_gadgets/erp5_rss', 'visible', 'public'),
 ('portal_gadgets/erp5_worklists', 'visible', 'public'),
 ('portal_gadgets/google_calendar', 'visible', 'public'),
 ('portal_gadgets/google_maps', 'visible', 'public'),
 ('portal_gadgets/google_search', 'visible', 'public'),
 ), 
 
 'erp5_trade':(('portal_rules/default_order_rule', 'draft', 'validate'),
 ('portal_rules/default_delivery_rule', 'draft', 'validate'),
 ),
 'erp5_invoicing':(('portal_rules/default_invoice_transaction_rule', 'draft', 'validate'),
 ('portal_rules/default_invoicing_rule', 'draft', 'validate'),
 ('portal_rules/default_trade_model_rule', 'validated', 'invalidate'),
 ),
 }
 
 #
 # Dictionary the expected filters for catalog. This is a usually determinated
 # by catalog.getFilterDict()
 #
 
 CATALOG_FILTER_DICT = { 
 'z_catalog_item_list' : 'python: here.providesIMovement()',
 'z_catalog_predicate_category_list': 'python: isPredicate',
 'z_catalog_movement_category_list': 'python: here.providesIMovement()',
 'z_catalog_delivery_list': 'python: isDelivery',
 'z_catalog_alarm_list': '',
 'z0_uncatalog_subject': 'python: isDocument',
 'z0_uncatalog_inventory': 'python: isInventory',
 'z_catalog_stock_list': 'python: here.providesIMovement() and not isInventoryMovement',
 'z0_uncatalog_versioning': "python:getattr(here, 'getVersion', None) is not None",
 'z_catalog_non_movement_category_list': 'python: not here.providesIMovement()',
 'z_catalog_email_list': '',
 'z_catalog_subject_list': 'python: isDocument',
 'z_catalog_movement_list': 'python: here.providesIMovement()',
 'z_catalog_predicate_list': 'python: isPredicate',
 'z_catalog_measure_list': 'python: here.getPortalType() in here.getPortalResourceTypeList()',
 'z_catalog_versioning_list': "python:getattr(here, 'getVersion', None) is not None",
 'z0_uncatalog_email': '',
 'z_catalog_quantity_unit_conversion_list': 'python: here.getPortalType() in here.getPortalResourceTypeList()',
 'z0_uncatalog_inventory_stock': 'python: isInventoryMovement'}
 
 
 #
 # List of Scripts to be run after upgrade is finished to determinate 
 # the integrity and consistency of the instance.
 #
 
 INTEGRITY_VERIFICATION_SCRIPT_ID_LIST = ('ERP5Site_verifyUpgradeIntegrity',
 'ERP5Site_verifyBT5UpgradeIntegrity',
 'ERP5Site_verifyMemcachedIntegrity',
 'ERP5Site_verifySQLCatalogFilterIntegrity',
 'ERP5Site_verifyActivityIntegrity')
 
 # 
 # Define the property and value ({'property' : 'value', ...} to be set or created 
 # into erp5 portal object.
 #
 ERP5_SITE_PROPERTY_DICT = {}
 
 
 #
 # Define instructions for migrate object class of a group of objects like:
 # (( relative_url <- Folder Relative URL where the object is located.
 # , 'script_to_run_before' <- Script ID that will test if the 
 # object can be migrated or not.
 # , 'Products.ERP5Type.Document.FROM.CLASS' <- Expected Class to be migrated
 # , 'Products.ERP5Type.Document.TO.CLASS' <- Class to be Migrated.
 # , 'script_to_run_after' <- Script ID that will run after test it finished.
 # ), )
 # 
 
 UPGRADE_OBJECT_CLASS_LIST = ( ('portal_gadgets', 
 'ERP5Site_testUpgradeObjectClass',
 'Products.ERP5Type.Document.Folder.Folder', 
 'Products.ERP5Type.Document.Gadget.Gadget', 
 'ERP5Site_testUpgradeObjectClass' ), )
 
 # Wrap everything into a dict
 signature_dict = {
 # Defines the alarms enabled for the upgrade
 'alarm_dict' : ALARM_DICT
 # Defines the default release for bt5
 , 'release': DESTINATION_RELEASE
 # Defines the default version for zope
 , 'zope': ZOPE_VERSION
 # Defines the default version for python
 , 'python': PYTHON_VERSION
 # Defines the default release for products
 , 'product': DESTINATION_RELEASE
 # Defines the default location of bt5
 , 'bt5_base_url_list': BT5_URL_BASE_LIST
 # Provides a snapshot of how workflow chains should be configured
 , 'workflow_chain_dict': WORKFLOW_CHAIN_DICT
 # Provides a list of required bt5 (without which upgrader wont't work)
 , 'required_bt5_id_list': REQUIRED_BT5_ID_LIST
 # Provides a list of bt5 which can be upgraded by the upgrader (if already installed)
 , 'upgradable_bt5_id_list': UPGRADABLE_BT5_ID_LIST
 , 'update_catalog_bt5_id_list' : UPDATE_CATALOG_BT5_ID_LIST
 , 'before_triggered_bt5_id_dict': BEFORE_TRIGGERED_BT5_SCRIPT_ID_DICT
 , 'after_triggered_bt5_id_dict': AFTER_TRIGGERED_BT5_SCRIPT_ID_DICT
 # Provide a list of bt5 which require reinstallation
 , 'reinstalable_bt5_id_list': REINSTALABLE_BT5_ID_LIST
 # Provides a list of bt5 path and items which must not be upgraded or deleted
 , 'keep_original_dict': KEEP_ORIGINAL_DICT
 # Provides a list of bt5 path which require workflow action after upgrade
 , 'validation_dict': VALIDATION_DICT
 # Provides a list of script ids that will be run after the upgrade to check the Instance Integrity
 , 'integrity_verification_script_id_list': INTEGRITY_VERIFICATION_SCRIPT_ID_LIST
 # Provides a dict with expected catalog filter expressions
 , 'catalog_filter_dict': CATALOG_FILTER_DICT
 # Provides a list of portal types to had rules updated.
 , 'update_role_portal_type_list': UPDATE_ROLE_PORTAL_TYPE_LIST
 # Provide a list of Property Sheet Expected into a portal type list
 , 'portal_type_property_sheet_list' : PORTAL_TYPE_PROPERTY_SHEET_LIST
 # Provide a list of Properties Expected at ERP5Site portal
 , 'erp5_site_property_dict' : ERP5_SITE_PROPERTY_DICT
 # Provide a list of tuples with informations to upgrade object class
 , 'upgrade_object_class_list' : UPGRADE_OBJECT_CLASS_LIST
 }
 
 if item is not None:

 else:
